## Install from Github

```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(devtools)
devtools::install_github("EnriquePH/OEIS.R")
```

## Load Package

```{r}
library(OEIS.R)
```


```{r}
id <- "A003456"
A003456 <- OEIS_sequence(id)
A003456
```
